document_data.name: Codicillary Rules of Engagements for the Flaming Fist
document_data.mainbody: '''''Codicillary Rules of Engagements for the Flaming Fist''''' was one of the [[book]] of rules to be followed by the members of the [[Flaming Fist]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1492}}, ''Codicillary Rules of Engagements for the Flaming Fist'' were found across the Flaming Fist barracks and detention centers of Baldur's Gate. One of these books, found in the [[Basilisk Gate]] barracks, was hollowed out to hide a common-size flask.
